pullrequest.title: Add random walk support to GaussianNoise

content.raw: Might it be easier to construct the base ```Noise``` class with a ```SensorPtr``` and provide protected functions on the ```Noise``` class to grab the absolution time and absolution sensor position in the world frame. These functions would typically be called by user code within the ```Noise::Apply``` function.  It will then be up to the sensor noise model itself to track the delta time or position and calculate the correct perturbation. The advantage of this approach is that there is no change to the existing ```Apply(...)``` signature, as we're augmenting the base ```Noise``` class with additional (optional) information.
